metadata.title: Pulsar - Create pages to document your project
metadata.description: Create modern documentation for your application using Pulsar. You will generate custom static documentation pages with Pulsar and can use them wherever you want.

loading.message: Your page is loading, please wait a moment.

databasesync.title: Documentations is not synced
databasesync.description: Your documentation is not in the database, click the button below to synchronize now. This action not affect your data, just move the data to Pulsar servers!

navbar.donate-buy-me-a-coffe-description: Help the developer of this project donating in Buy me a coffe.
navbar.donate-pix-description: Help the developer of this project donating in Pix.

documentations.title: Pulsar - Your documentations
documentations.new-doc-modal-creating-loading-message: Creating your documentation, wait a moment...
documentations.new-doc-modal-editing-loading-message: Editing your documentation, wait a moment...
documentations.delete-doc-dialog-title: Do you want to delete the documentation?
documentations.delete-doc-dialog-message: After deleting this documentation, you won't be able to recover your data. Think better before taking this action.
documentations.upload-documentation-modal-loading-messa: Uploading your documentation, wait a moment...
documentations.doc-card-loading-message: Opening your documentation, wait a moment...
documentations.doc-list-loading-message: Loading your documentations, wait a moment...

editor.title: Pulsar - Editing
editor.controls-menu-visibility-box-description: When the documentation is set to public all peoples can see with the shared link.
editor.controls-menu-confirm-visibility-dialog-: Do you want to turn this documentation
When the documentation is set to public all peoples can see with the shared link.
editor.delete-category-dialog-title: Do you want to delete the category?
editor.delete-category-dialog-message: After deleting this category, you won't be able to recover your data. Think better before taking this action.
editor.delete-page-dialog-title: Do you want to delete the page?
editor.delete-page-dialog-message: After deleting this page, you won't be able to recover your data. Think better before taking this action.
editor.export-cancel-dialog-title: Do you want to cancel the export?
editor.export-cancel-dialog-content: After canceling this action you will not have any implications for your data, but you will have to compile the project again.
editor.export-modal-loading-message: Compressing your documentation data, wait a moment...
editor.export-modal-error-message: An error occurred, click the button below to try again.
editor.info-page-change-on-saving: Your page is saving, wait a moment to change page.

customize.title: Pulsar - Customize
customize.controls-menu-empty-customizations-messa: No customizations found, create one using the button above.
customize.delete-customization-dialog-title: Do you want to delete this customization?
customize.delete-customization-dialog-message: After deleting this customization you will not be able to recover the deleted data, so think carefully before taking this action.
customize.customization-informations-menu-what-tha: Here you can create components like Navbars and Footers to give your documentation a more personalized touch.
customize.customization-informations-menu-open-nav: Use this to open the default mobile navigation menu of Pulsar.
customize.customization-informations-menu-navigate: Use this to navigate to a route and have the ability to build a navigation menu from scratch.
customize.customization-informations-menu-colors-d: Use this to apply the colors of your doc to your component.

homepage.features-export-description: Export docs easily using Vite to run the documentation.
homepage.features-share-description: You can easily share your docs just by sharing a link.
homepage.features-customizations-description: Create custom components like, navbars and footers.
homepage.features-colors-description: Customize all colors of your documentations.
homepage.features-preview-description: You can easily preview the final documentation.
homepage.features-markdown-description: The editor has support to markdown features.
homepage.features-cobeblocks-description: The editor has support to highlighted code blocks.
homepage.features-tables-description: The editor has support to resizable tables.
homepage.editor-features-description: Unlock your creativity using, Code Blocks, Markdown, Slash Commands, and Tables in the Pulsar editor.
homepage.editor-features-codeblocks-description: You can easily create a highlighted codeblock to document your codes in Pulsar editor.
homepage.editor-features-tables-description: You can easily create a table in your documentation to organize better your text on Pulsar editor.
homepage.editor-features-customizations-descripti: You can easily create a customization (Navbars, Footers, etc) using the customization editor.
homepage.customizations-description: Give your documentation the look of your goal, and you will be able to create components using HTML/CSS/JS.
homepage.customizations-features-html-description: The customizations editor has support to HTML, then you can easily create beautiful components.
homepage.customizations-features-css-description: The customizations editor has support to CSS, then you can easily create beautiful styles to your components.
homepage.customizations-features-javascript-descr: The customizations editor has support to Javascript, then you can easily create interactivity to your components.
